movie.title: Blind Truth
movie.description_intro: Obsessed with the murder of his friend, an FBI agent tracks down the killer who has resurfaced after 25 years of dormancy.
movie.description_full: Obsessed with the murder of his friend, an FBI agent tracks down the killer who has resurfaced after 25 years of dormancy.

movies.title: Illusions
movies.summary: It's London, 1892 and Defendant 47 is on trial but can't remember who he is. He only can remember a few details, where he's been lately and glimpses of the past. Defendant 47 slowly starts remembering that he's mathematician who runs a photography studio. He now remembers that his preferred subject were children. Through them, he met Ellen Rhodes, the one who will only bring him to a dark end.

movies.title: Cash on Demand
movies.summary: A ruthless crook apparently abducts the wife and child of a bank manager and then masquerades as an insurance company detective while scheming to rob the institution in this crime drama. Unfortunately, some of the manager's employees learn about the plot and the terrified manager must beg them to remain silent. Fortunately, the police have been on the case all along.

movies.title: Climate of the Hunter
movies.summary: Two sisters vie for the affections of a man who may or may not be a vampire.
movies.description_full: Two sisters vie for the affections of a man who may or may not be a vampire.
movies.synopsis: Two sisters vie for the affections of a man who may or may not be a vampire.

movies.title: Last Seen in Idaho
movies.summary: A woman awakens from a coma after a car accident and begins having shocking visions of her future murder. It's a race against the clock as she tries to solve and prevent her own murder.
movies.description_full: A woman awakens from a coma after a car accident and begins having shocking visions of her future murder. It's a race against the clock as she tries to solve and prevent her own murder.
